I'm currently developing EJB in VAfJ.
I wonder if the classes called by the TestCase could access the JNDI service. It seems the TestCase itself can access the Context but the Context lookup (in the test class seem to fail). 

Do I have to do something specific to access the JNDI server then ?

Tx,

Thomas,
subject: Cannot find JNDI in Visual Age
